title: Global Times: The rebirth of Thuja sutchuenensis, ancient tree species being preserved, as ecological protection gains speed
description: Thuja sutchuenensis once thought extinct, is revived through strict protection, restoration efforts, and local community support. Thuja sutchuenensis once thought extinct, is revived through strict protection, restoration efforts, and local community support.
content:
Beijing, China, Dec. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Towering like a pagoda, with scale-like leaves and roots gripping rocks, this tree stands upright on steep cliffs.
